item.title: New Guestbook!
item.description: I have a new guestbook! When i updated it last night, turns out it wasn't working (lol) it should be now!!! Feel free to leave me doodles you made on the paint app and/or a message!! :)

item.title: POLLYGON VER. 2.0!
item.description:
Hey there! Said goodbye to my retro layout and decided to try a new one, so here's POLLYGON 2.0! it's fully mobile-responsive unlike its predecessor (though the content is not mobile-responsive atm..) and will have some apps like Paint and possibly more soon. :)
Currently working on making mobile-friendly pages on my layout so I'll go back to coding OTL
Really like how it turned out!

item.title: HAPPY NEW YEAR!
item.description: Happy new year!! Since it's new year, I plan to change the layout of my site. Possibly more mobile friendly?? But still an OS site ofc :) Please look forward to it!

item.title: New Projects Section!
item.description: Heyyy there! Updated my projects corner ;) please check it out!

item.title: New art section look... again!
item.description: Finally fixed the art section look I want LOL sadly not mobile responsive but it is what it is. The modals can be minimized and maximized btw so have fun checking it out!

item.title: New art section!
item.description: Made a new art section with my commissions posted there! I think it'll display pretty good but I'm still not sure about its responsiveness...

item.title: New Domain!
item.description: my site is now under the pollygon.dev domain!
